unusual_spending_patterns.description: Higher spending in July compared to June, potentially due to travel expenses (Delta Airlines and Florida Shadow Hotel)
Large single transaction at KMART (106.90) on June 25, which is significantly higher than the average transaction amount

insights.description: Travel expenses make up the largest portion of spending at 31.31%
Groceries are the second-highest expense category at 25.37%
There are no income transactions recorded in this period
July spending is significantly higher than June spending

recommendations.description: Consider reducing travel expenses by looking for more affordable options or limiting non-essential trips
Look for ways to reduce grocery expenses, such as meal planning or using coupons
Set a budget for each category to control spending, especially in high-expense areas like travel and groceries
Track income transactions to get a more accurate picture of financial health
Review the large KMART transaction to ensure it was necessary and consider spreading out large purchases in the future
